title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2040/93 of 27 July 1993 determining the amount of production aid for potatoes for human consumption in Madeira and the amounts of production aid for seed potatoes and endives in the Azores fixed in ecus by the Council and reduced as a result of monetary realignments
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2040/93 of 27 July 1993 determining the amount of production aid for potatoes for human consumption in Madeira and the amounts of production aid for seed potatoes and endives in the Azores fixed in ecus by the  Council and reduced as a result of monetary realignments
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The aids referred to in Articles 16 and 27 of Regulation (EEC) No 1600/92, reduced in accordance with Article 2 of Regulation (EEC) No 3824/92, are hereby fixed at ECU 494 per hectare.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 July 1993.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 July 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 387, 31. 12. 1992, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 387, 31. 12. 1992, p. 29.
(3) OJ No L 158, 30. 6. 1993, p. 18.
(4) OJ No L 57, 10. 3. 1993, p. 18.
(5) OJ No L 132, 29. 5. 1993, p. 114.
(6) OJ No L 173, 27. 6. 1992, p. 1.
(7) OJ No L 378, 23. 12. 1992, p. 23.
